In England, in the seven days to 03 November, there were 218,663 new confirmed cases (386.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 October, there were 239,396 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (20,733 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 November is 7,925,681 (14,015.3 cases per 100,000 population).
